Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(dbplyr)
library(dbplot)
library(DBI)
 

start = Sys.time()

dfh = read.csv('C:\\Users\\morrismr\\Downloads\\data\\highDim_dataset.csv')
dfl = read.csv('C:\\Users\\morrismr\\Downloads\\data\\lowDim_dataset.csv')

# dfh['my_extra_column'] = dfh['A'] + 1
  


dfh_treated = dfh[dfh$A == 1, ]#expr[expr$cell_type %in% c("hesc", "bj fibroblast"), ]
dfh_control = dfh[dfh$A == 0, ]
dfl_treated = dfl[dfl$A == 1, ]
dfl_control = dfl[dfl$A == 0, ]

mhat_highdim_1 = lm(Y~., data=dfh_treated)
mhat_highdim_0 = lm(Y~., data=dfh_control)
# summary(mhat_highdim_1)
# summary(mhat_highdim_0)

# mt(X) is a consistent estimate for E(Y given T = t and X)
# regress Y on X (two cases, one for group where t = 1 and one where t = 0)

hist(dfh$A)
# str(dfh)
N = nrow(dfh)
sum = 0
m1_total = 0
m0_total = 0
for(i in 1:N) #run through each row in original dataset
{
  # print(i)
  m1 <- suppressWarnings(predict(mhat_highdim_1, newdata=dfh[i,]))
  m0 <- suppressWarnings(predict(mhat_highdim_0, newdata=dfh[i,]))
  m1_total = m1_total + m1
  m0_total = m0_total + m0
  sum = sum +  m1 - m0
}
output_high = sum/N
sprintf("High-dimensional estiamte of ATE: %f", output_high)

dfh_treated[1,"Y"]



mhat_lowdim_1 = lm(Y~., data=dfl_treated)
mhat_lowdim_0 = lm(Y~., data=dfl_control)
# summary(mhat_lowdim_1)
# summary(mhat_lowdim_0)

# mt(X) is a consistent estimate for E(Y given T = t and X)
# regress Y on X (two cases, one for group where t = 1 and one where t = 0)

# hist(dfl$A)

# str(dfl)
N = nrow(dfl)
sum = 0
m1_total = 0
m0_total = 0
for(i in 1:N) #run through each row in original dataset
{
  # print(i)
  m1 <- suppressWarnings(predict(mhat_lowdim_1, newdata=dfl[i,]))
  m0 <- suppressWarnings(predict(mhat_lowdim_0, newdata=dfl[i,]))
  m1_total = m1_total + m1
  m0_total = m0_total + m0
  sum = sum +  m1 - m0
}
output_low = sum/N

sprintf("Low dimensional estiamte of ATE: %f", output_low)

end = Sys.time()
print(as.numeric(end - start, units = "secs"))





```
